name: Persian Literature: Ethical, Erotic, and Mystical
description: Explores the ethical works of Sa‘di (Bustan and Gulistan); the mystical Mantiq al-Tayr of ‘Attar and the Masnavi of Rumi; and the ghazals, or mystico-erotic poems, of Rumi and Hafiz. Emphasizes close reading and analysis of the texts and their historical, cultural, and religious backgrounds.
prerequisites: NML360Y1 or adequate knowledge of Persian
